topic.title: The abstract description about <bodydiv> and <sectiondiv> element testing

body.p:
body_section_div body_section_div.dita: This case test the basic usage of <bodydiv> and <sectiondiv>
Step1: Run the map.ditamap
Step2: Check body_section_div.dita
bodydiv_reference.dita: This case test the nested bodydiv reference
Step1: Run the map.ditamap
Step2: Check bodydiv_reference.dita
sectiondiv_reference.dita: This case test the nested sectiondiv reference
Step1: Run the map.ditamap
Step2: Check sectiondiv_reference.dita
